QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TurnAroundDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of additional distance to add outside the survey area for vehicle turn around.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TurnAroundDistanceMultiRotor
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Amount of additional distance to add outside the survey area for vehicle turn around.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: CameraTriggerInTurnAround
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Camera continues taking images in turn arounds.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: HoverAndCapture
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Stop and Hover at each image point before taking image

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Refly90Degrees
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Refly the pattern at a 90 degree angle

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TerrainAdjustTolerance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Additional waypoints within the transect will be added if the terrain altitude difference grows larger than this tolerance.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TerrainAdjustMaxClimbRate
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The maximum climb rate from one waypoint to another when adjusting for terrain. Set to 0 for no max.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: TerrainAdjustMaxDescentRate
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The maximum descent rate from one waypoint to another when adjusting for terrain. Set to 0 for no max.
